user.title: Vidaa TV
user.description: Enter the IP address of your Hisense TV. Make sure the TV is powered on.

confirm.title: Confirm Vidaa TV
confirm.description: Do you want to set up {name} ({host})?

pair.title: Pair with TV
pair.description: A PIN code should appear on your TV ({name} at {host}). Enter the PIN below.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Vidaa TV
reauth_confirm.description: The TV at {host} requires reauthentication. A new PIN will be displayed on the TV.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to TV. Make sure the TV is on and reachable.
error.invalid_pin: Invalid PIN. Please check the PIN on your TV and try again.
error.invalid_host: Invalid host. Enter a valid IP address or hostname.

abort.no_host: Could not determine TV host address.
abort.not_vidaa_tv: Device is not a Hisense/Vidaa TV.
abort.too_many_attempts: Too many failed PIN attempts. Please restart the setup.

init.title: Vidaa TV Options
init.description: Configure options for your Vidaa TV.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the TV for state updates (in seconds).

command_failed.message: Failed to send command to TV: {error}

send_key.name: Send Key
send_key.description: Send a remote key press to the TV.

key.name: Key
key.description: The key to send (e.g., KEY_POWER, KEY_UP, KEY_OK)

launch_app.name: Launch App
launch_app.description: Launch an application on the TV.

app.name: App
app.description: The app to launch (e.g., netflix, youtube, amazon)
